select t1.user_id, t1.dept_id, t2.comp_id, t3.est_id, t2.comp_name, t3.est_name, t4.dept_name from organization_user t1 left join company t2 on t1.comp_name = t2.comp_name left join establishment t3 on t1.est_name = t3.est_name left join department t4 on t1.dept_id = t4.dept_id where org_user_id = #{userId};
